amendment.description: To modify the Border Oversight Task Force to include tribal government officials.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1198, under the order of 6/17/2013, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 0. Record Vote Number: 153.

action.text: Amendment SA 1198 proposed by Senator Tester.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1198, under the order of 6/17/2013, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 0. Record Vote Number: 153.
